member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ElasticityOfDemandExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to get the elasticity of demand attribute.

member.summary: Returns the ElasticityOfDemand attribute.

member.summary: Sets the value of the ElasticityOfDemand attribute.
member.param: The value to which the ElasticityOfDemand attribute is set.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ElasticityOfSupplyExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to get the elasticity of supply attribute.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ElasticityOfSupplyExtensions.ElasticityOfSupply(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Returns the ElasticityOfSupply attribute.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ElasticityOfSupplyExtensions.ElasticityOfSupply(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the value of the ElasticityOfSupply attribute.
member.param: The value to which the ElasticityOfSupply attribute is set.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculateMarketEquilibriumExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to calculate the market equilibrium condition.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculateMarketEquilibriumExtensions.MarketEquilibrium(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Returns the value of the MarketEquilibrium attribute.
member.returns: The value of the MarketEquilibrium attribute.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculateMarketEquilibriumExtensions.CalculateRootMarketEquilibrium(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Sets the MarketEquilibrium attribute.
member.returns: A reference to the existing . This is returned for use with fluent syntax calls.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculateMarketEquilibriumExtensions.CalculateMarketEquilibrium(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Sets the MarketEquilibrium attribute. Result = (shockedPrice ^ elasticityOfSupply) - [(priceIndex ^ (elasticityOfSubstitution + elasticityOfDemand)) / (initialPrice ^ elasticityOfSubstitution)]
member.returns: A reference to the existing . This is returned for use with fluent syntax calls.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.DefineAttributeDataExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to set attribute values using a data file.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.DefineAttributeDataExtensions.DefineAttributeData(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,AD.IO.DelimitedFilePath)
member.summary: Defines attributes on the root and descendants using a data file.
member.param: A with headers and double values.
member.returns: A reference to the existing . This is returned for use with fluent syntax calls.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.DefineAttributeDataExtensions.DefineAttributeData(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,AD.IO.DelimitedFilePath,System.Int32)
member.summary: Defines attributes on the element using a data file.
member.param: The element to which attributes are added.
A with headers and double values.
The row index of the data (where the header row == -1) for this element.
member.returns: A reference to the existing . This is returned for use with fluent syntax calls.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculatePriceIndexExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to calculate prices for markets described by XML trees.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculatePriceIndexExtensions.PriceIndex(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Returns the value of the PriceIndex attribute.
member.returns: The value set by the user to the "PriceIndex" attribute.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.CalculatePriceIndexExtensions.CalculatePriceIndex(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Sets the PriceIndex attribute by aggregating the price indices of itself or any sub-markets. Result = [Î£ marketShare[i] * (price[i] ^ (1 - elasticityOfSubstitution[i])] ^ [1 / (1 - elasticityOfSubstitution)]
member.returns: A reference to the existing . This is returned for use with fluent syntax calls.

member.name: T:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ShockPriceExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to appy tariff shocks to initial prices.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ShockPriceExtensions.ShockedPrice(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Gets the ShockedPrice attribute.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ShockPriceExtensions.ShockPrice(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Sets the ShockedPrice attribute = initialPrice * (1 + tariff)
member.returns: A reference to the existing . This is returned for use with fluent syntax calls.

member.name: M:AD.PartialEquilibriumApi.ShockPriceExtensions.ShockAllPrices(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Sets each ShockedPrice attribute in reverse document order = initialPrice * (1 + tariff)
member.returns: A reference to the existing . This is returned for use with fluent syntax calls.
